fields.title: COVID-19 WHO Thailand Weekly Situation Update No. 262 - 25 April 2023
fields.body:
4,730,490 confirmed cases

33,947 total deaths

**Daily average numbers reported from 15 –22 April 2022**

- 155* new confirmed cases per day    
*(including hospital admissions only)

- 1 death per day

**Main messages**

- Continue to reduce community transmission of COVID-19 across Thailand 

- RTG encourages COVID-free settings and booster vaccinations

- Get vaccinated, maintain universal precautions and stay informed

text:
# COVID-19 WHO Thailand Weekly Situation Update No. 262 - 25 April 2023

4,730,490 confirmed cases

33,947 total deaths

**Daily average numbers reported from 15 –22 April 2022**

- 155* new confirmed cases per day    
*(including hospital admissions only)

- 1 death per day

**Main messages**

- Continue to reduce community transmission of COVID-19 across Thailand 

- RTG encourages COVID-free settings and booster vaccinations

- Get vaccinated, maintain universal precautions and stay informed
summary: The World Health Organization's Thailand Weekly Situation Update No. 262 reported 4,730,490 confirmed cases and 33,947 total deaths. From 15-22 April 2022, the daily average numbers reported were 155 new confirmed cases per day (including hospital admissions only) and 1 death per day. The main messages are to continue to reduce community transmission of COVID-19, encourage COVID-free settings and booster vaccinations, and to get vaccinated, maintain universal precautions, and stay informed.

metadata.name: COVID-19 WHO Thailand Weekly Situation Update No. 262 - 25 April 2023
